=== Robert James Clay ===

Switched to using Linux  as my primary Operating System for personal use in around 1998;  initially with Slackware v3.4 and then changing to Debian starting with v2.2.  (Linux Counter registered user # 239007.)  Now primarily use Debian or Ubuntu.

Personal Home Page:  http://rocasa.us/~jame

Some of what I am or have been working on:
* Have adopted the Debian ttylog package:   reference http://rocasa.org/ttylog and http://packages.debian.org/source/lenny/ttylog
* Work on packaging for the program MakeNL, which I have made available in my PPA:  http://ppa.launchpad.net/rjclay/ubuntu
* Working on creating a debian package for MBSE BBS (http://www.mbse.dds.nl/mbse):  reference http://rocasa.org/mbsedeb
* Working on creating a debian package for Synchronet BBS (http://www.synchro.net):  reference http://rocasa.org/syncdeb/synchronet
